faq.title: Sta≈æen√≠ videa
faq.description:

‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏èVanced do aplikace nikdy nep≈ôid√° ≈æ√°dn√Ω druh stahovac√≠ho programu t≈ôet√≠ch stran.‚ö†Ô∏è Nejen, ≈æe je to pro v√Ωvoj√°≈ôe obt√≠≈æn√© udr≈æovat, ale hlavnƒõ to d√°v√° spoleƒçnosti Google je≈°tƒõ dal≈°√≠ d≈Øvod zaslat ozn√°men√≠ o zastaven√≠ ≈°√≠≈ôen√≠, co≈æ znamen√°, ≈æe pro Vanced bude v√Ωvoj zastaven.

To nikdo nechce, tak≈æe stahov√°n√≠ z jin√Ωch zdroj≈Ø/videa YouTube z aplikace Vanced nebudou nikdy podporov√°na. Neptejte se, zda mohou v√Ωvoj√°≈ôi tuto funkci p≈ôidat. Pokud nem≈Ø≈æete stahovat z aplikace Vanced, zakupte si YouTube Premium.‚ö†Ô∏è

faq.title: Chyba gesta p≈ôejet√≠m
faq.description: If you have enabled "old comments" from youtube settings > vanced settings > layout, disable it and restart the app. If that doesnt work, try clearing the app data and cache. If that doesnt work, report on our github repo. Look up on previous issues before creating a new one.

faq.title: Titulky nejsou dostupn√©
faq.description:
For various issues like captions not available or info button missing, read this:
Not every videos have subtitles, info buttons, etc. and this is not a bug from vanced. Please check on the official YouTube app and desktop site(www.youtube.com) for such issue before reporting. 

It all depends on the video uploaders who don't include subtitles nor providing any information to be given with info button. Vanced has nothing to do with this. 

TL;DR: It's not a YouTube Vanced issue, please check the official YouTube app or desktop site for these things before reporting it as not every video has them.

faq.title: Darov√°n√≠
faq.description:
We DO NOT accept any sort of donations under any circumstances and any site or link or post that says "donate for vanced" is fake.

But if you‚Äôd like to support the Vanced devs, you can use this Brave referral code:

https://brave.com/kev231

faq.title: Tlaƒç√≠tka pro pokroƒçil√© vyhled√°v√°n√≠ videa
faq.description:
Use the inbuilt accessibility settings to change the accessibility controls. Open settings in "Youtube Vanced" app and tap on accessibility. It will open this setting as shown in picture above.
If you still can't find the options, Head to device settings > accessibility and find "accessibility menu" then disable it.
Also, if that still doesn't work, disable sound amplifier, switch access, live caption if you have them enabled as well.

faq.title: Proƒç Split APKs?
faq.description:
To start off:

1. What are split apks?
It's a zip file which contains the base apk, config apk for your device architecture and language apk.

For example, a typical normal apk has both 32 bit and 64 bit support file, lots of language files and a base apk. So if your device is only 32 bit and you only want english language file, why would you want an extra files which you don't even need and will result in taking huge space in your storage.

**Advantages**:
‚Ä¢ size of split apk is almost half of normal apk
‚Ä¢ a split apk only has those files which are relevant for your device and architecture

**Disadvantages:**
Difficult to newbies or non-technical people

2. Why split?
Google only distributes the YouTube APKs after version 14.54 in split APKs now , so in order to install Vanced, we have to use SAI (Split APK Installer).
Previously, they provides normal apk making it easy to install apps on every device.

3. why dev's don't patch apks and make apk from it?
It's not like that they can't. It's about increased time in doing this. Converting from apks to apk adds time which they can use that in other ways(both personal and vanced bugs/updates). So please don't ask how to get normal apk. Use old version if you are really lazy or official YT app from play store directly.

faq.title: App Splash color
faq.description:
The splash screen background color is now taken from the Android framework color (Android system) to make sure Vanced/Youtube changes its splash coloir according to the system theme. Whatever is the Android framework color, the same color would show up in vanced.

You can use Substratum/Swift themes to change the theme color.

faq.title: Why redownload?
faq.description:
The reason is pretty simple: sometimes a downloadeded file can be corrupted, trying to grab them and install will result in an infinite loop of failure. To avoid this, the manager redownloads files every time you press the button.

However, the Non-Root installer can now use the already downloaded files to reinstall Vanced.

faq.title: Mikrofon
faq.description:
If you're wondering why there is no microphone permission in the root version of Vanced, that's because the APK used to modify Vanced (minAPI17) is missing the microphone permission. The other APK has it (minAPI21) but that lacks the translation. Why? Ask Google ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Workaround: use the non-root variant, or stock YouTube.

NOTE: These issues only exist in version 14 and below. The permissions are now fixed from version 15.

faq.title: ExoPlayer
faq.description:
1. Co je ExoPlayer?
ExoPlayer je p≈ôehr√°vaƒç m√©di√≠ na √∫rovni aplikace pro Android. Poskytuje alternativu k rozhran√≠ Android MediaPlayer API pro p≈ôehr√°v√°n√≠ zvuku a videa lok√°lnƒõ i p≈ôes Internet. ExoPlayer podporuje funkce, kter√© aktu√°lnƒõ nepodporuje Android MediaPlayer API, vƒçetnƒõ adaptivn√≠ho p≈ôehr√°v√°n√≠ DASH a SmoothStreaming. Na rozd√≠l od rozhran√≠ MediaPlayer API se ExoPlayer snadno p≈ôizp≈Øsobuje a roz≈°i≈ôuje a lze jej aktualizovat prost≈ôednictv√≠m aktualizac√≠ skrze Obchod Play.

2. Rozd√≠ly mezi V1 a V2?
V1:

  > Lep≈°√≠ optimalizace pro za≈ô√≠zen√≠ ni≈æ≈°√≠ t≈ô√≠dy. 

  > M≈Ø≈æete p≈ôepnout na v1, pokud v√°m V2 zaƒçne dƒõlat probl√©my.

V2: 

  > Nen√≠ podporov√°no za≈ô√≠zen√≠mi ni≈æ≈°√≠ t≈ô√≠dy. M≈Ø≈æe doch√°zet k probl√©m≈Øm, m≈Ø≈æe zp≈Øsobit p√°dy aplikace, r≈Øzn√© chyby, zpo≈ædƒõn√≠, ƒçernou obrazovku. 

  > Optimalizov√°no pro nejnovƒõj≈°√≠ za≈ô√≠zen√≠ vydan√° po roce 2019

POZN√ÅMKA: S verz√≠ 15.33.34 je ExoPlayer V2 vynucen spoleƒçnost√≠ Google. Pokud V2 zp≈Øsob√≠ probl√©m s va≈°√≠m za≈ô√≠zen√≠m, p≈ôepnƒõte na V1.

PSA: ExoPlayer V2 je EXPERIMENT√ÅLN√ç, nepou≈æ√≠vejte jej, pokud nev√≠te, co dƒõl√°te. Pokud jej m√°te zapnut√Ω, nehlaste chyby. Pokud ƒçel√≠te p√°d≈Øm aplikace/zpo≈ædƒõn√≠m/chyb√°m atd., p≈ôepnƒõte na ExoPlayer v1.

faq.title: Mo≈ænosti v√Ωvoj√°≈ôe
faq.description: In vanced settings, tap on the "About" section 6-7 times to unlock a secret menu. This menu only enables the additional video codec settings.

faq.title: J√°dro
faq.description:
If you're having issues related to microG core & vanced and looking for an answer, here‚Äôs a list of what, so far, can be done:

1. You need to have Pico Gapps, at least, to run vanced.

2. You can‚Äôt run vanced with microG core because it needs Google Play Services Framework which is available in all Gapps packages.

3. If you are worried about your privacy & don‚Äôt want to use Gapps but still want to use Vanced then there are old Nokia phones still available in the market. :)

faq.title: Chromecast
faq.description:
As of Vanced version 14.21.54 and MicroG version 0.2.6.17455, Chromecast should work by default. If it doesn't, connect to the chromecast with the regular version of youtube. You can then add videos/control using YouTube Vanced.

NOTE: Microg V0.2.11 fixed Chromecast so be sure to update your microg versions if you are running 0.2.10 or lower.

faq.title: Podepisov√°n√≠ APK
faq.description:
In newest Vanced versions till V15.40.37, you should disable apk signature verification in order to install Vanced using Split Apk Installer, but many users choose "sign apk" option in SAI which will cause crashes in Vanced. 

*Do not enable options you weren't asked to enable! *

In order to solve crashes, just reinstall Vanced but this time disable sign apk option in SAI.

faq.title: Obchod Play
faq.description:
‚ö†Ô∏èPlease don't install any fake apps named "YouTube Vanced" on the Play Store and any other store. We won't publish nor upload any type of all there. ‚ö†Ô∏è

If you find any app with our app logo and name, take a quick look at that app with the description and all its reviews. If it doesn't look good to you, report that app to Google Play and don't download them as those apps could have malicious files/adwares which can get injected in your device resulting in poor performance of your device or breaking your Android.

Our app can only be found on our official links which we provide. Join our channel for all updates(https://t.me/Vanced) or use our discord server.

Stay safe :)

faq.title: Seznam aplikac√≠
faq.description:
If YT Vanced app is not visible in your app drawer, follow these steps:

‚Ä¢ Install the regular YouTube app from the Google Play Store

‚Ä¢ Open the app until your front page shows up (not sure if this is necessary. Just reconstructing what's been working for others all the time).

‚Ä¢ Go to Settings > Apps > YouTube. It should show "Uninstall" on the top left. DO NOT Uninstall! Just see if it says that there!

‚Ä¢ Reboot

‚Ä¢ Go to Settings > Apps > YouTube. Now it should say "Disable" or "Deactivate". DO NOT Uninstall! Just see if it says that there!

‚Ä¢ In the same menu; tap on the three dot menu button on the upper right corner and tap on "Remove/Uninstall Updates".

Now the YT Vanced app should show in your launcher.

OR

[Follow this link](https://forum.xda-developers.com/showpost.php?p=75068670&postcount=299) if above solution didn't work for you.

faq.title: Videa se nep≈ôehr√°vaj√≠
faq.description:
If a video is buffering on a browser/app and ist't playing, it is an HWC or mediaserver issue. Change your ROM or update it up to the latest version to fix your issue. Otherwise, report to ROM developers.

If you are using custom skins, then you can try checking the issue in youtube app and report to your device community so they can bring a fix in next update for you.

There's nothing else we can do since issue is ROM side.

faq.title: 480p issue due to Covid-19 Pandamic
faq.description:
It's NOT a vanced bug/issue. It's youtube doing this due to lockdowns in various countries to limit data usage and huge traffic so that every user can browse on the internet with less issues.

However, YouTube has lifted this cap now. So you can ignore whatever's said below. If you still have 480p as maximum while the video resolution showing on desktop is higher, you can use the below workaround as a temporary fix until Google removes the cap in your region/on your network.

PLEASE NOTE: 

‚Ä¢ Anything happens on YouTube happens on YouTube Vanced since everything is controlled by YouTube servers.

fields.title: Mo≈æn√° z√°stupn√° ≈ôe≈°en√≠
fields.content:
1) You can try with a VPN if you are lucky. YouTube applied this in most countries so you have to pick your new region wisely.

2) Watch on desktop mode [www(dot)youtube(dot)com]

3) Since the 480p restriction is only for mobile devices and not tablets we can change the model of the device in YouTube Vanced to overcome the restriction.

a) Open YouTube Vanced

b) Enable additional options by going to Settings -> Vanced Settings -> Tap on the About section till you get a message saying hidden Menu is visible

c) Go to Codec override -> Override model and enter the model number of any tab e.g. "SM-T865" and device to "Samsung"

d) Restart the app and the 480p limit should be gone now

e) Enjoy

faq.title: How to hide the Vanced microG notification
faq.description:
To hide microG notifications, disable battery optimisation for microG. If the notification isn't hidden, reboot your device and it will be fixed.

If the notification doesn't go away, 

1. just tap and hold the notification

2. tap on the settings icon to the right and,

3. toggle off notification from there(battery saving exclusion), the notification will no longer appear.

faq.title: Vysok√© rozli≈°en√≠
faq.description:
If your device only supports 720p/1080p resolution, you can still play videos up to 4k but the video will be scaled down back to your device's native resolution and not true 4k. 

Only true 4k resolution can be seen on flagship devices (SD855).

To enable high resolutions, head to Vanced settings > video settings and turn on "resolution checks" then restart the app.
